meanings.definition: To extend a joint beyond its normal range of motion.
meanings.sent1: She was hyperextending her arm to reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent2: He always hyperextends his knee when he tries to kick the ball too hard.
meanings.sent3: The yoga instructor joked that she was hyperextending her back to impress everyone.
meanings.sent4: The gymnast's flexibility was so impressive that it seemed like she was hyperextending her body effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's graceful movements included hyperextending her legs to create beautiful lines.

meanings.definition: The act of extending a body part beyond its usual limits.
meanings.sent1: His hyperextending of his fingers made it difficult for him to hold onto the slippery bar.
meanings.sent2: The doctor warned against hyperextending the neck during the exercise to avoid injury.
meanings.sent3: The contortionist's hyperextending of her spine amazed the audience with its flexibility.
meanings.sent4: The tree branches seemed to be hyperextending towards the sky, reaching for the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's hyperextending of his arms helped him reach the finish line just in time.
